author: crogers
msg: Fix in ParseUtils.convertType() to handle the case for BEEHIVE-1193 where the parameter values, an empty String[] is converted into a single-valued object. Also added a new select tag test to cover the case where client side Javascript is used to disable the select tag before the submit.
